attributes.action: LIFT ALCOHOL RESTRICTIONS AT FOOTBALL MATCHES
attributes.additional_details:
Campaign to lift the alcohol restrictions  at football matches in England.  Football fans have been discriminated against for far too long. If a rugby match took place at your clubs stadium the fans would be allowed to sit in their seats and enjoy a pint.
FOOTBALL STADIUMS HAVE CHANGED!
FOOTBALL CLUBS HAVE CHANGED!
and
FOOTBALL FANS HAVE CHANGED!
We want the Government to lift these absurd restrictions now!
